bill_title: to mandate that funds appropriated for the higher education funding formula be used for salaries.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to mandate that funds appropriated for the higher education funding formula be used for salaries. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. Moneys appropriated by the Legislature to the Board of Regents in the general appropriation act to fund the higher education funding formula for the state fiscal year beginning July 1, 1997, and ending June 30, 1998, shall be used for salaries at the Board of Regents institutions. 750 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.015 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.
